EmailTemplate.subject: Let's set up your BlueWave Community Solar Share account!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
View this email in your browser
DEAR {!Contact.Name}
It's BlueWave here, your Community Solar Share provider!
In December, your share is going to start generating energy, which means we need you to set up your BlueWave billing account and get ready to start seeing savings on your utility bill!
To set up your automatic Community Solar Share monthly payments, please fill out your account form here and login to your BlueWave portal to update your password.
For security reasons, we've sent you a separate email with your personal portal login details. If you haven't received this email, let us know immediately!
We're hosting an event to celebrate the launch of your Community Solar Farm!
Come sip hot chocolate, check out your Solar Share in person and meet the BlueWave team!
Thanks for choosing BlueWave as your Community Solar provider.
If you have any questions about your Community Solar Share, you can call us at 844.786.4100 or email us at customercare@bluewave-capital.com
Thanks for joining us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
Our mailing address is: 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02139
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe from this list
